name: Crops out of Space
description:
This game was originally created for the Global Game Jam 2022. The theme of the game jam was Duality, so we decided to go with the duality of "Moral vs Immoral". We took our game jam version and added more to it, as well as optimized the gameplay. If you run into any issues with the game, please email us at PastryKitchenTeam@gmail.com

Credits Design Rose Wang - Programmer / System Designer Kylar Black - Programmer / Designer Rick Herrera - Lead UI Designer Danny Diep - Designer / Tester Jake Sullivan - Lead Programmer Amber Robbins - Writer Art Rylie Parker - Art lead / Main ArtistAlex Kiselich - 2D Artist / Supporting ArtistKatherine Murphy - 2D Artist / Supporting ArtistMackenzie Scott - 2D Artist / Supporting ArtistSound Fernando Valadez - Sound Engineer Toby Rodriguez - Composer
